short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a YouTube link on the Google, Bing, & DuckDuckGo search results page and YouTube search by right-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For when you need to search YouTube right Meow!

Do you need to search YouTube right now? Well do you? This extension adds a new YouTube link on the Google, Bing, & DuckDuckGo search results page allowing you to easily transfer your current search to YouTube.

And when you're not on Google, Bing, or DuckDuckGo there is also the added ability to search YouTube by selected text and right-click.
